faq1.question: What is ChatterPay?
faq1.answer: ChatterPay is a WhatsApp wallet that allows any user to manage blockchain funds easily and securely without technical knowledge.

faq2.question: How can I create a wallet?
faq2.answer: To create a wallet, you can do it directly from the ChatterPay Bot on WhatsApp by typing something like 'I would like to create an account'. You can save the following number: {PHONE}. Remember that creating your account is 100% free, with no maintenance costs.

faq3.question: What are the fees?
faq3.answer: Opening your account is 100% free, with no maintenance costs. We only charge a fixed transaction fee (swap, transfer) based on network congestion from $0.2 USD to $0.5 USD per transaction.

faq4.question: Can I exchange between different tokens?
faq4.answer: Yes, you can exchange between USDT, USDC, WBTC, WETH, and more currencies without transaction limits.

faq5.question: Where is my wallet's private key stored?
faq5.answer: Your private key is securely stored using Account Abstraction technology on a layer 2 blockchain called Scroll, ensuring high security and user control.

faq6.question: How do I log in to the website?
faq6.answer: Enter your registered phone number. A 6-digit code will be sent to your phone for security; once you enter it, you can access the site.

faq7.question: How can I contact the ChatterPay team?
faq7.answer: Through the same WhatsApp chat ({PHONE}), you can request support at any time and we will respond as soon as possible.

hero.title: Our Mission
hero.description: ChatterPay is revolutionizing the way people send money by combining secure payments with the most used messaging app in the world. Our mission is to make crypto simple, in order to onboard the next billion users.

story.title: Our Story
story.text1: Founded in 2024 at The Level Up Hackathon by Ethereum Argentina, where we won 1st prize in the Keystore track and were the most voted team in Quadratic Funding. We also won at Ethereum Uruguay and ICP Chain Fusion Hackathon BA.
story.text2: During these hackathons, we iterated and improved the product based on feedback and early users.
story.text3: Recently, we were selected for Scroll Open Campus in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. This is where we will launch the wallet on the Scroll network, continuing our mission of making crypto simple and accessible to everyone.

founders.martin: Martin transitioned from law and business into Web3 innovation. He founded several blockchain startups and led projects at P4 Tech, Fin Guru, Sistem AI, and more.
founders.tomas: Tomas is a full-stack developer and UX expert. He builds scalable blockchain systems and led teams at FinGurú, Argenenergy, and advised at Invicta Ventures.
founders.diego: Diego is a software architect with 25+ years of experience. He led teams, built cloud systems, and worked with many languages across major tech companies.
